titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for setting apart a day of solemn and publick thanksgiving throughout the whole kingdom
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Christopher Barker and John Bill, Printers to the Kings most Excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Given under Our Sign Manual at Our Court at Whitehal, the Fifth day of June, in the Twelfth Year of Our Reign, 1660.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
